results.name: Signature permutation of a Catalan bijection: row 3748 of A089840.
comment: This bijection of binary trees is obtained in the following way. (Inverse of Thompson's B!):
or (a . (() . c)) -> (c . (a . ())) if the former is not possible.
link: A. Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2055
Index entries for signature-permutations of Catalan automorphisms
program: (Destructive version of this automorphism in Scheme:) (define (*A154124! s) (if (and (pair? s) (pair? (cdr s)) (pair? (cadr s))) (*A074680! (cdr s)) (*A089853! s)) s)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 06 2009
